name: It Spreads
description:
The zombie apocalypse has come, but instead of playing the humans, you're the zombies! And you have to solve puzzles to infect humans and spread the virus. Enjoy this retro-themed puzzle platformer as each level gets increasingly more complicated.

Controls: A&D or <&>

press R to restart and esc to open the menu.

All assets made by me, do not use without permission, music created using Ecrett music.
